active_incidents.title: Some customers are receiving banner notifications for threads they're following

notes.body: Some users are unexpectedly receiving banner notifications for replies in threads they're following when the preference to receive them was not previously enabled. We're investigating and will let you know as soon as we know more.

active_incidents.title: Some customers are unable to receive 2FA SMS messages

notes.body: Some customers are unable to receive 2FA (two-factor authentication) SMS messages. This is due to an issue experienced by one of our upstream partners. We are investigating further and will share back when we have more updates.
